title: How robotics will affect the availability of employment and social benefits (Brookings Institution)
text: ( Source : Brookings Institution ) The modern workforce is changing in response to rapidly emerging technological innovation. Technology , long seen as a driver of economic growth, is replacing workers in many fields. This raises questions
